text: Ani jevha te tya upadesala visarale, jyaci tyanna sikavana dili geli hoti, tara amhi tyancyavara pratyeka cija-vastuce daravaje khule kele, yethaparyanta ki jevha apana prapta kelelya cijavastunvara te ghamenda karu lagale tevha tyanna amhi acanaka tavadita ghetale, maga te nirasa ho'una basale
